#summary The layer background attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

== Usage ==

Do not use [LayerElement <layer>].  The `<layer>` element was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.

== Elements ==

You can use the `background` attribute on the following elements:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
